title: Halo 3 - Sunrise
heading: July Playlist Update
body: Maption Sack is back with a selection of community made maps! Or, why not try out Mythic Brawl, a chaotic 12-player free-for-all!|n|nFancy something a bit more competative? Ranked playlists are now available to guests and parties, just make sure you've downloaded all of the DLC.|n|nIBy the way, we can now convert MCC forge maps for matchmaking playlists! Want to see your map in the rotation? Why not send it our way via the Original Halo 3 Discord server at https://discord.gg/halo3.|n|nGLHF!
